title: Boston Dynamics, Google reunite on next-gen Atlas humanoid
description:
At CES, Boston Dynamics reunited with Google, demoed Atlas for the first time in public, debuted a new production version of the humanoid, and announced a roadmap to deploy Atlas in Hyundai factories worldwide.

The post Boston Dynamics, Google reunite on next-gen Atlas humanoid appeared first on The Robot Report.
